mapper.select: SELECT c.USER_ID AS userId, c.ITEM_ID AS itemId, c.AMOUNT AS amount, s.ITEM_NAME AS itemName, s.PRICE AS price, s.STATUS AS itemStatus, i.AMOUNT AS stockAmount, i.UUID AS uuid FROM CART c JOIN SHOP s ON c.ITEM_ID = s.ITEM_ID JOIN INVENTORY i ON s.STOR_ID = i.STOR_ID WHERE c.USER_ID = #{userId} AND s.STATUS = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND ITEM_ID = #{itemId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADDRESS (ADDRESS, ADD_NAME, USER_ID) VALUES (#{address}, #{addName}, #{userId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ADDRESS WHERE ADD_ID = #{addressId} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
